item.description:
We're always looking for new faces to round out those strange little bits of information that we don't know and have a great time with at Trivia. And keeping up our streak, in the most recent outing, the group scored another first place finish. Come out and help us spend the winnings while answering trivia questions with some cool folks while making fun of the inattentive wait staff.

And if you haven't experienced the over the top performance of Tucker, the trivia master for the event, you really should come out...

The trivia starts at 8 and runs until 10.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with the Rhode Island Curiousities Book and a Meetup sign on the table.
item.name: Team Trivia with Tucker @ Snookers
